duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct independent, impartial reviews of medical documentation to ensure services provided are in accordance with recognized standards of care and current medical literature.
Review cases remotely on a flexible schedule, likely 1-2 cases a month.
Supplement income while maintaining an active practice through case rates of $30 per case (20-30 minutes per case).

Stay abreast of emerging practices and technologies in the chiropractic field through exposure to controversial, cutting-edge treatment modalities and observing treatment decisions made by other chiropractors.

education_certification.credential: Active practice of a minimum of 8 hours per week, Board Certification, and a clean record. Minimum of 5 years of recent full-time patient care experience. Above average computer navigation skills and an unrestricted Kentucky state license.
